Sean Sperte

Bandwidth Eaters

I guess having two podcasts (one video, one audio) maintain rankings in the Top 100 of Religious podcasts (on the iTunes Music Store) doesn’t come without it’s drawbacks. Sheesh!

(That’s 1.3 terabytes, just so you know.) So, allow me a moment to remind everyone: Podcasts eat a ton of bandwidth.

Thank you, that’s all.
